title: Remove TuiConfig dependency from core config models
description:
**As a** Consoul SDK user
**I want** core configuration models free of TUI dependencies
**So that** I can use the SDK without installing Textual or TUI code

**Context:**
Currently, src/consoul/config/models.py (line 28, 44) imports TuiConfig from consoul.tui.config, creating a circular dependency where SDK core depends on TUI layer. This prevents using the SDK independently.

**Issue:** Core config â†’ TUI coupling blocks headless SDK usage

**Technical Notes:**
- Fix: src/consoul/config/models.py lines 28, 44
- Current problem: from consoul.tui.config import TuiConfig
- Create: ConsoulCoreConfig (SDK-only fields)
- Create: ConsoulTuiConfig (composition: core + tui fields)
- Migrate: TUI-specific fields to separate model
- Update: All SDK code to use ConsoulCoreConfig
- Update: TUI code to use ConsoulTuiConfig
- Reference: SDK analysis identified this as critical coupling issue

**Acceptance Criteria:**

**Given** I import consoul.config.models in a headless environment
**When** Textual is not installed
**Then** No import errors occur for ConsoulCoreConfig

**Given** I use the SDK without TUI
**When** I load configuration with ConsoulCoreConfig.from_file()
**Then** All SDK features work without TUI fields

**Given** I use the TUI
**When** I load configuration with ConsoulTuiConfig.from_file()
**Then** TUI gets both core and TUI-specific config fields

**Given** Existing config files exist
**When** Config loading occurs
**Then** Backward compatibility is maintained with warnings

**Testing Considerations:**
- Test config loading without Textual installed
- Test SDK usage with ConsoulCoreConfig only
- Test TUI usage with ConsoulTuiConfig composition
- Test config migration for existing users
- Verify no circular imports
- Test config validation with both models

**Implementation Hints:**
- Create ConsoulCoreConfig(BaseModel) with SDK-only fields
- Move TUI fields (theme, keybindings, etc.) to TuiConfig in tui/config.py
- Create ConsoulTuiConfig(BaseModel) with core: ConsoulCoreConfig, tui: TuiConfig
- Update config loader to detect which config type to load
- Add deprecation warnings if TUI fields found in SDK-only usage
- Update all SDK code to use ConsoulCoreConfig
- Update all TUI code to use ConsoulTuiConfig
- Document migration path in CHANGELOG
